q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
a1: I hope so. Unless they were just lucky this time. But I think they have what it takes.
q2: Croatia's challenge is to make sure they are competing to this standard at future World Cups rather than hanging on the warm, fuzzy memory of 2018 two decades from now.
a2: They have a good grassroots system - we forgot they finihsed third in 1998
q3: I was surprised that Croatie was in the finals.
a3: So many people were surprised that Croatia was in the World cup finals but they had many talented players and were very lucky.
q4: I don't think it was luck, they played great football
a4: Did they have a realistic chance of beating France though?
a5: But if they improve his team coordiantion they have a chance to win
